457350.name: Terrarium Land Demo
457350.description:
"TERRARIUM LAND" is a 3D action-logic-adventure arcade game.
Spaceship with Robot T.I.X. crashed.
And now adventure and battles with mechanical enemies named “cybozoorgs” begin in the “Terrarium Land” world. Decide puzzles and destroy enemies on different levels to save planet`s biota.
Do explore the world`s levels, find secret places, unique artifacts and bonuses. Do buy and find powerful bombs and weapons. All this will help you in battles.

Robot T.I.X. is a main hero of the game. T.I.X. is Transportation Intelligence – Experimental model of spy-cyborobot with different kinds of peculiarities
The Robot uses up a generator of magnetic field for transporting, scanning objects and for interaction with environment. Also it uses up different bombs and weapons for battles with enemies. Unique equipments for adventure on planets.
Health and energy are robot`s parameters. His health is decreased by the wounds and it is record by the bonuses.
Robot`s energy is decreased during run, jumps and magnetic field generator`s work, and it`s energy is recovered during inaction.

Levels mostly are original medium arenas with enemies and puzzles, traps and tasks.
You have some tasks to complete level and continue adventure . Tasks are different. Explore or find something , missions to destroy or annihilate, tasks to collect artifacts and others.

  • 3 unique planets.
  • There are different locations with various environment and weather conditions.
  • Interaction with environment.
  • The main hero uses special equipments in the different situations.
  • World`s inhabitants have different behavior.
  • Some of them are harmless and cowardly and inhabitants are aggressive to you..
  • There are various tasks for planets adventures.
457350.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
